Type.Name: HierarchyChangedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void HierarchyChangedHandler(object o, HierarchyChangedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the HierarchyChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the HierarchyChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the HierarchyChangedHandler is removed from the event.
